Sentencas: Nine different concepts for natural gas fired power plants with CO2 capture have been investigated, and a comparison is made based on net plant efficiency and emission Of CO2.
Titulo: A quantitative comparison of gas turbine cycles with CO2 capture

Sentencas: The cycles are one post-combustion, six oxy-fuel and two pre-combustion capture concepts.
Titulo: A quantitative comparison of gas turbine cycles with CO2 capture

Sentencas: A 400 MW combined cycle plant is applied as a reference case.
Titulo: A quantitative comparison of gas turbine cycles with CO2 capture

Sentencas: A common basis for the comparison of all concepts is defined and employed in heat- and mass-balance simulations of the various concepts.
Titulo: A quantitative comparison of gas turbine cycles with CO2 capture

Sentencas: As gas turbine cooling impacts the net plant efficiency at high turbine inlet temperatures, a simplified turbine cooling model has been applied in the simulations.
Titulo: A quantitative comparison of gas turbine cycles with CO2 capture

Sentencas: It is found that the concepts, in which novel technology (the hydrogen membrane separation reformer--MSR-H2, the advanzed zero emission power plant-AZEP, the solid oxide fuel cell combined with a gas turbine-SOFC + GT and the chemical looping combustion-CLC concepts) is employed, exhibit the best performance with respect to both efficiency and in most cases also CO2 capture (capture rates close to 100%).
Titulo: A quantitative comparison of gas turbine cycles with CO2 capture

Sentencas: Post-combustion capture and pre-combustion capture with auto-thermal reforming, which are based on more mature technology, show a lower efficiency and a capture rate of typically 90%.
Titulo: A quantitative comparison of gas turbine cycles with CO2 capture

Sentencas: The SOFC + GT concept exhibits the best cycle performance and even better than a standard CC plant, however, any realization of a SOFC-GT 400 MW plant has a very distant future perspective.
Titulo: A quantitative comparison of gas turbine cycles with CO2 capture

Sentencas: In order to conduct a complete assessment of these diverse concepts, other criteria for comparison such as e.g. technology level and costs should also be considered.
Titulo: A quantitative comparison of gas turbine cycles with CO2 capture

Sentencas: This is not, however, included in the present work.
Titulo: A quantitative comparison of gas turbine cycles with CO2 capture
